alert.note: Alert for Fulton; Randolph; Sharp (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 15 at 9:55PM CDT until October 15 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Randolph County in eastern Arkansas... Eastern Fulton County in north central Arkansas... Northeastern Sharp County in north central Arkansas... * Until 1045 PM CDT. * At 954 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Salem in Fulton County, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cherokee Village... Salem in Fulton County... Highland in Sharp County... Mammoth Spring... Hardy... Ravenden Springs... Mammoth Spring State Park... Williford... Armstrong... Heart... Moko... Fryatt... Saddler Falls... Eleven Point... Saddle... Wirth... Ozark Acres... Salem Airport... Camp... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
